location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: PZ 2405/41 'Question of Air Mail Bags during Iraq disturbances.'

physicalDescription.extent: The correspondence is arranged in reverse chronological order.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the British Minister in Siam [Thailand] and the Foreign Office, regarding the sending of air mail bags while disturbances in Iraq cause an interruption of the air service.
